alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 12:12PM MST until January 03 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Winchester, Mohler, Nezperce, Waha, Craigmont, Gifford, Kamiah, and Culdesac. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds could create blizzard like conditions with significant blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
